original_title: Phoenix expands its reach with the opening of a new showroom in Battaramulla
original_body_lines: Phoenix Industries, a renowned lifestyle products brand, is pleased to announce the opening of its newest branch in Battaramulla. This expansion aims to provide easier access to Phoenix’s diverse range of products for customers residing in Colombo, Battaramulla, Malabe, Pelawatta, and Thalawathugoda.

The newly opened branch serves as an experiential center, allowing customers to have an immersive shopping experience. Here, customers can explore a wider range of products and choose from an extensive collection that caters to their unique needs and preferences.
The Battaramulla branch is designed to showcase Phoenix’s commitment to innovation, quality, and

contemporary design. It offers a comprehensive selection of furniture, decor, office essentials, and lifestyle accessories, enabling customers to transform their living spaces into inspiring havens. With the opening of this new branch, Phoenix Industries aims to strengthen its position as a leading provider of lifestyle products in Sri Lanka.
The company’s focus on exceptional customer service and high-quality offerings remains unwavering, ensuring that every customer receives utmost satisfaction. Phoenix’s top priority is to
create products that are designed to be a part of our consumer’s lives and the opening of this showroom takes them one step closer to achieving this goal.
